trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Holly
There were no other sightings in Holly on or around October 24th 2012
divs: Sighting Details1. I was laying on the couch, watching TV. 2. My TV is in front of a big bay window, it was impossible to miss. 3. A fireball..then I thought a star way falling perhaps.. 4. It looked like a big orange flash that was shooting downward until it disappeared. 5. I was surprised. It was not something I usually see out my window. I immediately texted myself so I would remember the event the next day; but mostly to get a time stamp. 11:39pm 6. It disappeared from view. I stood up and moved to the window, but there was nothing left to see.
Summary: Saw a orange flash from the sky...plummet straight down...thru the bay window while I was watching TV.
